Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns by default the next non-expired football predictions. URL parameters can be specified to show specific date in the past or future or to filter by federation and prediction market name.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves football match predictions for upcoming matches by default. Supports filtering by date range (past or future), federation, and prediction market name. Returns an array of prediction objects containing match details, predicted outcomes, and confidence metrics. Non-expired predictions are returned by default.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple predictions from different sources are returned and added context about response contents.

data.current_description: Returns all predictions available for a match id.
data.summary_suggestion: Get all predictions for a specific match
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available predictions for a specific football match identified by its match ID. Returns an array of prediction objects from different prediction markets and models, each containing predicted outcomes, confidence scores, and market-specific details. Useful for comparing multiple prediction models for a single match.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple predictions from different sources are returned and added context about response contents.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/performance-stats' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are selectable or all returned, and lacks context about the response structure. Added clarity on available metrics, time window options, and use case for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns predictions accuracy in the last 1, 7, 14, 30 days.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves performance statistics for prediction models across multiple time windows (1, 7, 14, and 30 days). Returns accuracy metrics, hit rates, and other performance indicators for each time period. Useful for monitoring model reliability and comparing performance trends over different timeframes.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are selectable or all returned, and lacks context about the response structure. Added clarity on available metrics, time window options, and use case for AI agent decision-making.
